The United Arab Emirates (UAE) is the world's first female indicator of respect for women and other indicators
The results of the report did not surprise me with the UAE's respect for women, but the UAE offers to many countries that used to criticize women's rights.
Women in the UAE are gracious, respected and capable because our religion is Islam, and the founder of our country is Zayed, and behind our rise are authentic Arab values

We respect the woman as a mother, sister, wife and daughter, and we appreciate her as a teacher, engineer, doctor, employee and partner in the building of homelands, is the spirit of the place and deserves all respect
The UAE has respected women and their contribution has outstripped men in many sectors. If women have the right environment, their bid exceeds all expectations

../.na história das Letras Portuguesas. Queria também ressaltar nesta ocasião o seu qualificado contributo para a construção europeia e../.

Today I reviewed the Social Progress Index report which ranked the UAE # 1 for treating women with respect, and many other indexes.
Every woman has our deepest appreciation. Every role a woman takes to contribute to society makes her a partner in building our nation.
An interesting finding is that the UAE ranked higher than many countries where people often criticize the UAE over women's rights.

This evening we will mark Holocaust Martyrs '& Heroes' Remembrance Day, honoring the memory of the six million victims of the Holocaust.
The main difference between the helplessness of the Jews during the Holocaust and the situation of the Jews today>
> Is that today we have a strong, sovereign state with a strong military that can defend us against those who seek our lives.
Iran tops the list of Those who seek our lives; it has declared its intention to destroy us.
In addition to its effort to arm itself with nuclear weapons, Iran arms, finances and trains Hamas and other terrorist orgs on our borders.
Hamas denies the Holocaust even as it attempts to create an additional Holocaust by destroying the State of Israel.
It is with this Hamas that Abu Mazen chose to form an alliance last week. Instead of issuing statements to placate global public opinion -
Abu Mazen needs to choose between the alliance with Hamas, a terrorist org that calls for the destruction of Israel & denies the Holocaust,
and a true peace with Israel. We hope that he will disavow this alliance with Hamas and return to the path of true peace.
